# Pull Request Template

## Description

Provide a concise and clear description of the changes introduced in this pull request. What problem does it solve, or what feature does it add?

## Type of Change

*   [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
*   [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
*   [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
*   [ ] Documentation update
*   [ ] Refactoring / Code style update
*   [ ] Performance improvement
*   [ ] Chore (e.g., build process, tooling, tests)

## Motivation

Explain the *why* behind this change. Reference any related issues or discussions.

## Changes Made

*   List the key changes implemented in this PR.
*   For UI changes, consider including screenshots or GIFs.

## How Has This Been Tested?

Describe the tests that have been run to ensure the changes are correct and do not introduce regressions.

*   [ ] Unit tests
*   [ ] Integration tests
*   [ ] E2E tests
*   [ ] Manual testing (describe steps)

## Related Issues

Closes #

## Checklist

*   [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project.
*   [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
*   [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
*   [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation (if applicable).
*   [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
*   [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published.
*   [ ] I have updated the version number in `package.json` (if applicable).
*   [ ] I have included necessary instructions for testing the changes.

## Additional Information

Any other context about the pull request that might be helpful.
